title: Newly Renovated 1 or 2 Bed Top Floor Apt on Cortland **Video Tour**
posting_body: ['Bernal: Newly Renovated 1 or 2 Bed Top Floor Apartment above Cortland Shops and near Holly Park', 'Property Address', '235 Cortland Ave. #C | San Francisco, CA 94110', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'SF City Rents |', 'show contact info', 'Description', '**You can watch a video walkthrough of the actual apartment here: <URL>', '**To schedule an in-person tour at your preferred times, go to: <URL>', 'This top floor apartment features brand new finishes and fixtures throughout and a partial Bay view.', 'Located on the upper floor of a small four-unit building above Avedano Meats in the heart of all the shops on Cortland Ave in Bernal Heights, and just around the corner from Holly Park.', 'Super easy access to 101/280 freeways and a short walk to the tech shuttle stops.', 'Take advantage of a very flexible floor plan and use it as a 1 bedroom plus office/den/dining room (no closet), or as a 2 bedroom 2 bath.', 'The entire interior is new, including electrical, plumbing and heating systems.', 'The fully renovated kitchen features brand new finishes all the way around: new cabinets, new stone counters and new stainless steel appliances.', 'Both bathrooms have all new fixtures and stand-up showers (no bathtub).', 'Wonderful natural light throughout.', 'Shared washer/dryer on ground level.', 'Street parking only.', 'Small pets considered on a case by case basis with additional security deposit.', '12 month unfurnished lease.', 'Non-smoking unit and building.', 'Tenant pays all utilities.', '**To schedule an in-person tour or a Zoom/FaceTime tour at your preferred times, go to: <URL>', 'SF City Rents', 'DRE# 01182457 (please don’t use the DRE# to request a showing; instead provide the property address: 235 Cortland Ave. #C)', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', 'Amenities', 'Renovated Kitchen', 'Renovated Bathrooms', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry In Building', 'Den/Office', 'View', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1 or 2BD/2.0BA', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $3,900.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $40.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed on a case by case basis', 'Dogs allowed on a case by case basis']
